ID0EC
Begin forwarded message:
From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com>
Subject: Edits to sampling on new website
Date: 13 January 2022 at 10:09:49 am AEDT
To: Heath <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hey Heath,

Have had a full review of the sampling function on the website and believe that the below will clean up a lot of our problems. See comprehensive feedback below, and please give me a call or email if any of this needs clarifying:

Comments on sampling:

CARPET (apply across all our ranges)

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change options to to:

  • Full tile (250 x 1000mm)

  • Quarter tile (250 x 250mm)

  • Carpet folder - incl. all colors

Change button from 'order single colour' to 'place order'

FULL COLOR (FULL COLOR WALL PANELS AND FULL COLOR CEILING PANELS)

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change from 'Wall samples' to 'Full color samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm chip (75 x 100mm)

  • 25mm chip (75 x 100mm)

  • 30mm chip (75 x 100mm)

  • 12mm full color box - incl. all colors

DESK DIVIDERS

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change to 'Full color samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm chip (75 x 100mm)

  • 12mm full color box - incl. all colors

CLOUDS

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change to 'Full color samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm chip (75 x 100mm)

  • 12mm full color box - incl. all colors

BAFFLES

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change to 'Full color samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

For FilaSorb™

  • 12mm chip (75 x 100mm)

  • 12mm full color box - incl. all colors

Change from 'Wood Decorative Finish' to 'WoodBeQuiet™ Prints' - options:

  • 12mm chip (200 x 250mm)

  • 12mm full plank (250 x 1000mm)

  • Full box incl. all chips, booklet and cards.

FULL COLOR CEILING TILES

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change to 'Full color samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm chip (75 x 100mm)

  • 12mm full color box - incl. all colors

PRINTED WALL PANELS, PRINTED CEILING PANELS, PRINTED CEILING TILES

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all print options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request.

Change to 'Printed samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm Printed chip (150 x 150mm)

ACOUSTIC ART

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all print options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request.

Change to 'Acoustic Art samples'

Options should be:

  • 30mm Acoustic Art chip (300 x 300mm)

FRACTURE PANELS

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all color, design and thickness options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request

Change to 'Fracture samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm Chevron chip (75 x 100mm)

WEAVE

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all color, design and thickness options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request

Change to 'Weave samples

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 30mm Weave chip (150 x 200mm)

PIXEL

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all color, design and thickness options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request

Change to 'Pixel samples

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 24mm Pixel chip (75 x 100mm)

1912

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change to '1912 samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm Charles chip (300 x 300mm)

  • 12mm Bridget chip (300 x 300mm)

  • 12mm Louis chip (300 x 300mm)

  • 12mm Ludwig chip (300 x 300mm)

  • 12mm Florence chip (300 x 300mm)

  • 12mm complete design pack incl. all designs

TIMBERTOP

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all color, design and thickness options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request

Change to 'Timbertop samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Please remove the 'order a sample' hover feature for FilaSorb colours, only have this available for Wood Decorative Finish (also Wood Decorative Finish should come first)

Options should be:

  • 16mm Timbertop chip (100 x 205mm)

  • 25mm Timbertop chip (100 x 205mm)

  • 34mm Timbertop chip (100 x 205mm)

  • 43mm Timbertop chip (100 x 205mm)

SHAPES

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all color, design and thickness options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request

Change to 'Shape samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm Ogee shape (315 x 400mm)

  • 12mm Rectangle shape (850 x 400mm)

  • 12mm Right Triangle shape (300 x 400mm)

  • 12mm Hexagon shape (315 x 400mm)

  • 12mm Diamond shape (350 x 350mm)

  • 12mm Scale shape (400 x 317mm)

SCREENS

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all color, design and thickness options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request

Change to 'Screen samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm Fern chip (300 x 300mm)

WOODBEQUIET

Add disclaimer:

We strive to deliver you your selected samples, however due to the breadth of our ranges, we cannot always guarantee we have your exact request in stock. Where this arises, we will contact you with our suggested closest alternative.

Change to 'WoodBeQuiet™ samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm chip (200 x 250mm)

  • 12mm full plank (250 x 1000mm)

  • Full box incl. all chips, booklet and cards.

FRACTURE TILES

Add disclaimer:

Please note we do not have all color, design and thickness options available in this product sample. We will strive to send you the sample/s closest to your request

Change to 'Fracture samples'

Change button to 'Place order'

Options should be:

  • 12mm Deco tile (300 x 300mm)

  • 12mm Leadlight tile (300 x 600mm)

  • 12mm Swell tile (300 x 300mm)

  • 12mm Barcode tile (300 x 600mm)

On this page:

Change this sentence to:

'You can select up to 5 samples per order. For bulk sample orders please contact us directly.

Think that covers it. Yell out if I've missed anything? Thanks heaps!

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager
